article_title: Obama just enshrined a techie strike force to streamline government
article_text:
Thank you for your interest in licensing Fortune content. Please find information on various licensing contacts below and choose the one that best suits your needs:

1. To license Fortune articles, excerpts, or headlines for republication in various media (including books, eBooks, film, web, newsletters, newspapers, magazines and others), please email syndication@timeinc.com.

2. To license a Fortune cover, order reprint or e-print copies of an article or cover, or license an accolade, please contact PARS International at www.timeincreprints.com.

3. To license text only photocopies of Fortunearticles as print or digital handouts in academic settings, or in academic coursepacks, please contact the Copyright Clearance Center at www.copyright.com

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Tory Newmyer

twitter.description: President Obama today used a pen to inject some digital savvy into the federal bureaucracy. He signed an order enshrining a program that deploys technologists to try to streamline government servic...
twitter.title: Obama just enshrined a techie strike force to streamline government

article_metadata.keywords: obama, technology, obamacare, legacy, silicon valley
article_metadata.sailthru.tags: Obamacare, president barack obama, White House
article_metadata.description: Through an executive order, the president institutionalized a three-year-old program to make the bureaucracy more tech-friendly
article_metadata.sailthru.title: Obama just enshrined a techie strike force to streamline government
